title: Barlaam und Josaphat
description: Barlaam und Josaphat; Follower of Hans Schilling (German, active 1459 - 1467), from the Workshop of Diebold Lauber (German, active 1427 - 1467), Rudolf von Ems (Austrian, about 1200 - 1254), et al; Hagenau, Alsace, France (formerly Germany); 1469; Tempera colors, colored washes, and ink on paper bound between wood boards covered with pigskin; Closed: 30.8 × 21.9 × 9.2 cm (12 1/8 × 8 5/8 × 3 5/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 9; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
